name: Piña Colada
description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. First created in Puerto Rico in 1954 by Ramón 'Monchito' Marrero at the Caribe Hilton.

attributes.value: White Rum, Coconut Cream, Pineapple Juice

In a blender, combine 2 oz white rum, 3 oz pineapple juice, 1 oz coconut cream, and 1 cup crushed ice. Blend until smooth and slushy. Pour into a hurricane glass or large goblet. Alternative: Shake ingredients with ice and strain over fresh crushed ice for a more concentrated flavor
